```{r}
library(tsibbledata)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

nyc_bikes 
```

Wrangle start_time column into separate year, month and day columns 

```{r}
nyc_bikes <- nyc_bikes %>% 
  mutate(year = year(start_time),
         month = month(start_time, label = TRUE),
         day = wday(start_time, label = TRUE))
```
